info.description: This is the API server for the Radar Hub Manager system
info.title: Radar Hub Manager API

post.description: Authenticate user and return user info with JWT token

get.description: Get information about the currently authenticated user
List all commands or commands for a specific station

post.description: Create a new command to send to a station (HQ only)

get.description: Get a specific command by ID

put.description: Acknowledge a command by ID (Operator only)

get.description: List unacknowledged commands for a specific station (Operator only)
Get all schedules for a specific station (Operator only)

post.description: Create a new schedule for a station (Operator only)

get.description: Get a specific schedule by station ID and schedule ID (Operator only)

put.description: Update an existing schedule by station ID and schedule ID (Operator only)

delete.description: Delete a schedule by station ID and schedule ID (Operator only)

get.description: Get a list of all radar stations. Only users with ADMIN role can perform this action.

post.description: Create a new radar station. Only users with ADMIN role can perform this action.

get.description: Get station information by ID. Only users with ADMIN role can perform this action.

put.description: Update station information. Only users with ADMIN role can perform this action.

delete.description: Delete a radar station. Only users with ADMIN role can perform this action.

get.description: Get a list of all users. Only users with ADMIN role can perform this action.

post.description: Create a new user account. Only users with ADMIN role can perform this action.

get.description: Get user information by username. Only users with ADMIN role can perform this action.

put.description: Update user information. Only users with ADMIN role can perform this action.

delete.description: Delete a user account. Only users with ADMIN role can perform this action.

commander.description: ====== Thông tin kíp trực cho khung giờ này ======

elevation.description: mét so với mực nước biển

password.description: Chỉ dùng khi tạo mới, không trả về

station_id.description: Nếu là OPERATOR: trạm mà người dùng trực thuộc

ApiKeyAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
ApiKeyAuth.name: Authorization
